options.To Unweighted SIF: data is exported to unweighted SIF
options.To Weighted SIF: data is exported to weighted SIF
options.To Unweighted GraphML: data is exported to unweighted GraphML
options.To Weighted GraphML: data is exported to weighted GraphML

title: Dropdown Menu: Export -> Export Image
text: The image of the graph should

options.To PNG: the image of the graph is exported as a PNG
options.To SVG: the image of the graph is exported as an SVG
options.To PDF: the image of the graph is exported as a PDF

title: Dropdown Menu: Export -> Print
text: The image of the graph should

options.Print: the image of the graph should print
